message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! I believe it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1200000.
I'm interested in the product, but I think $1200000 is a bit steep. I'm willing to pay $900000 for it.

I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. However, I've had other interested parties inquiring about the product, and I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to lower the price to $1050000, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $950000 for the product.

I understand you're still looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for the product. I'm willing to lower the price to $1025000, but that's as low as I'm willing to go.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $975000 for the product.

I'm starting to feel like we're getting close, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure it's worth my while. I'm willing to lower the price to $1015000, but I'm not going any lower than that. This is my final offer on the product.
I appreciate your final offer, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $980000 for the product.

I've already made it clear that I'm not willing to go below $1015000, Bob. I'm starting to think you're not serious about making a deal. I'm going to have to consider other options. I'll give you one last chance, but I'm not budging on the price. I'll meet you at $1015000, but that's it. No lower.
I understand that you're not willing to budge on the price, but I'm still not comfortable with $1015000. I'm willing to pay $990000 for the product.
